original_text: These are the rules for a person who had a disease in his skin. They are for a disease that he might give to other people. They are for people who are too poor to buy three sheep.’
korean_text: 나병 환자로서 그 정결예식에 그의 힘이 미치지 못한 자의 규례가 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: for a person who had a disease in his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 피부에 질병이 있었던 사람을 위한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that he might give to other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다른 사람들에게 옮길 수 있는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who are too poor to buy three sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 세 마리 양을 살 만큼 너무 가난한 사람들을 위한 것입니다
